contents.title: Quarkus 中文乱码
contents.description: 在启动配置的 Runner 下面的 VM Options 添加

props.code:
val context = LocalContext.current
    val audioManager = context.getSystemService<AudioManager>()
    // 获取最大音量
    val maxVolume = audioManager?.getStreamMaxVolume(AudioManager.STREAM_MUSIC)
    println("最大音量：" + maxVolume)

    var currenVolume by remember {
        mutableStateOf(audioManager?.getStreamVolume(AudioManager.STREAM_MUSIC)!!.toFloat())
    }

    Column(
        horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally,
        verticalArrangement = Arrangement.Center,
        modifier = Modifier
            .fillMaxWidth()
            .fillMaxHeight()
    ) {
        Text(text = "asd:$currenVolume")
        Slider(
            value = currenVolume,
            valueRange = 0f..15f,
            steps = 15,
            onValueChange = {
                currenVolume = it
                println(it.toInt())

                audioManager?.setStreamVolume(AudioManager.STREAM_MUSIC, it.toInt(), 2)// flags参数：0无效、1显示控制、2隐式控制
            },
            colors = SliderDefaults.colors(
                inactiveTickColor = Color.Transparent,
                activeTickColor = Color.Transparent
            ),
            modifier = Modifier
                .width(200.dp)
                .fillMaxHeight()
        )
    }

children.value:
val context = LocalContext.current
    val audioManager = context.getSystemService<AudioManager>()
    // 获取最大音量
    val maxVolume = audioManager?.getStreamMaxVolume(AudioManager.STREAM_MUSIC)
    println("最大音量：" + maxVolume)

    var currenVolume by remember {
        mutableStateOf(audioManager?.getStreamVolume(AudioManager.STREAM_MUSIC)!!.toFloat())
    }

    Column(
        horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally,
        verticalArrangement = Arrangement.Center,
        modifier = Modifier
            .fillMaxWidth()
            .fillMaxHeight()
    ) {
        Text(text = "asd:$currenVolume")
        Slider(
            value = currenVolume,
            valueRange = 0f..15f,
            steps = 15,
            onValueChange = {
                currenVolume = it
                println(it.toInt())

                audioManager?.setStreamVolume(AudioManager.STREAM_MUSIC, it.toInt(), 2)// flags参数：0无效、1显示控制、2隐式控制
            },
            colors = SliderDefaults.colors(
                inactiveTickColor = Color.Transparent,
                activeTickColor = Color.Transparent
            ),
            modifier = Modifier
                .width(200.dp)
                .fillMaxHeight()
        )
    }
